sense.def:
To remain in a particular state
pomeni biti še naprej v določenem stanju in se ne spreminjati.

seg.quote: The results of these experiments remain a secret.

sense.def:
To remain in a place
pomeni ostati na določenem kraju in se nikamor ne premakniti od tam.

seg.quote: I was allowed to remain at home.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
remains
, še vedno obstaja.

seg.quote: Even today remnants of this practice remain.
The fact remains that they mean to destroy us.
...the demise of her last remaining relatives.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
remains to be done
, še ni bilo narejeno.

seg.quote: One hazard remained to be overcome.
It remains to be seen what the long term effects will be.

sense.def:
The remains of something
so deli nečesa, ki ostanejo, potem ko je večina drugega odstranjena ali uničena.

seg.quote: The remains of the meat sat on the kitchen table.
They discovered the remains of a huge dinosaur.

sense.def:
Remains
so predmeti in deli stavb iz davne preteklosti, največkrat najdeni pod zemljo.
